hr.header: Voditelj zbirke:\nIvan Smoljan, kustos\nUvid u zbirku: po najavi
hr.content: Zbirka kamenih spomenika brojčano je najmanja zbirka, ali je sadržajem iznimno bogata. Predmeti koji se u njoj nalaze datiraju od 12. do 20. stoljeća.\nIzdvajaju se Supetarski ulomak iz 12. stoljeća s uklesanim natpisom na ćirilici i glagoljici koji predstavlja jedinstveni nalaz te vrste na ovom području te dvije natpisne ploče s pročelja Pazinskog kaštela iz 15. stoljeća. Zbirka sadrži i kapitele (14. - 17. st.), ulomke nadgrobnih ploča, a od predmeta novijeg datuma, tu su spomen-ploče poginulih u Prvom i Drugom svjetskom ratu na području Pazinštine.

en.header: Collection manager:\nIvan Smoljan, curator\nCollection insights: upon announcement
en.content: Collection of Stone Monuments is the smallest Museum Collection in number but extremely rich in history whose fundus dates in the period between the 12th and the 20th century. \nSeveral items stand out from the Collection, such as the Supetarski ulomak from the 12th century decorated with Cyrillic and Glagolitic inscriptions which is an unique finding of the area. Also, the Collection guards two inscriptions from the entrance facade of the Castle from the 15th century, capitals (14th – 17th century), tombstone fragments and memorial plaques which commemorate the fallen of the First and Second World War.
